content:
Hi! I’m Bryan. I completed my BS at Cornell University with a double major in Chemical Engineering and Computer Science, and a minor in Electrical Engineering. I stayed and completed my M.Eng in Chemical Engineering shortly after.
My interests include machine learning, hardware, optimization under uncertainty, algorithmic design, embedded systems and computational chemistry. Outside of academics I’m an avid hiker and reader. I currently live in Ithaca, NY.
